meta.label: Clear intermediate datasets
meta.description: Drop data from intermediate datasets of a Flow.

params.name: project_key
params.label: Project to delete datasets from
params.description: If empty, defaults to current project.

params.name: datasets_to_exclude
params.label: Datasets to exclude
params.description: Allows to manually select datasets that shouldn't be cleared regardless of their type

params.name: is_dry_run
params.label: Dry run
params.description: Only lists the datasets to clear without performing data deletion.
